name: RoofMind AI Inspection Review & Report Generation

parameters.prompt:
=You are a professional roof inspection quality reviewer for RoofMind, a leading commercial roofing inspection company. Review this inspection data and provide detailed feedback.

**INSPECTION DATA:**
Property: {{ $json.property_name }}
Inspection ID: {{ $json.inspection_id }}
Inspector: {{ $json.inspector_name }}
Quality Score: {{ $json.qualityScore }}/100 ({{ $json.qualityGrade }})

**EXECUTIVE SUMMARY:**
{{ $json.executiveSummary?.summaryText || 'No executive summary provided' }}

**DEFICIENCIES ({{ $json.deficiencies?.length || 0 }} total):**
{{ ($json.deficiencies || []).map((def, i) => `${i+1}. ${def.category}: ${def.description} (Location: ${def.location || 'Not specified'}, Cost: $${(def.budgetAmount || def.estimatedCost || 0).toLocaleString()})`).join('\n') }}

**CAPITAL EXPENSES:**
{{ ($json.capitalExpenses || []).map(cap => `${cap.description} - Year ${cap.year}: $${cap.estimatedCost.toLocaleString()}`).join('\n') || 'None specified' }}

**QUALITY ISSUES DETECTED:**
{{ ($json.qualityIssues || []).map(issue => `‚Ä¢ ${issue}`).join('\n') }}

**Please provide:**

1. **SPELLING & GRAMMAR REVIEW**: Check all text for errors and provide corrections
2. **COST ESTIMATE VALIDATION**: Assess if cost estimates are reasonable for each deficiency type
3. **TECHNICAL ACCURACY**: Review terminology and classifications for industry standards
4. **COMPLETENESS ASSESSMENT**: Evaluate if inspection meets RoofMind quality standards
5. **BRAND VOICE COMPLIANCE**: Ensure professional, authoritative tone consistent with RoofMind standards
6. **SPECIFIC RECOMMENDATIONS**: Provide actionable improvements

**RoofMind Brand Standards:**
- Professional, technical language
- Detailed, accurate descriptions
- Industry-standard terminology
- Cost-conscious recommendations
- Safety-first approach
- Clear, actionable findings

Format your response as JSON with the following structure:
```json
{
  "overallAssessment": "Summary of inspection quality",
  "grammarCorrections": ["List of spelling/grammar issues and corrections"],
  "costValidation": ["Assessment of each cost estimate"],
  "technicalReview": ["Technical accuracy observations"],
  "completenessScore": "X/10 with explanation",
  "brandCompliance": "Assessment of brand voice adherence",
  "recommendedEdits": ["Specific changes to improve quality"],
  "finalRecommendation": "APPROVE/APPROVE_WITH_EDITS/REJECT with reasoning"
}
```

body.content:
ü§ñ AI Inspection Review Complete

Enhanced report ready for review and approval

Quality Score: {{ $json.enhancedReport.qualityScore }}/100 ({{ $json.enhancedReport.qualityGrade }})

AI Recommendation: {{ $json.enhancedReport.aiReview.finalRecommendation }}

üìç Property Information

Property: {{ $json.enhancedReport.propertyName }}

Address: {{ $json.enhancedReport.propertyAddress || 'Not provided' }}

Inspector: {{ $json.enhancedReport.inspectorName }}

Inspection ID: {{ $json.enhancedReport.inspectionId }}

Review Date: {{ new Date().toLocaleDateString() }}

üéØ AI Assessment Summary

Overall Assessment: {{ $json.enhancedReport.aiReview.overallAssessment }}

Completeness Score: {{ $json.enhancedReport.aiReview.completenessScore }}

Brand Compliance: {{ $json.enhancedReport.aiReview.brandCompliance }}

{{ $json.enhancedReport.aiReview.grammarCorrections?.length > 0 ? '
‚úèÔ∏è Spelling & Grammar Review
    ' + $json.enhancedReport.aiReview.grammarCorrections.map(correction => '
  • ' + correction + '
    • ').join('') + '
' : '' }} {{ $json.enhancedReport.aiReview.costValidation?.length > 0 ? '
üí∞ Cost Estimate Validation
    ' + $json.enhancedReport.aiReview.costValidation.map(validation => '
  • ' + validation + '
    • ').join('') + '
' : '' }} {{ $json.enhancedReport.aiReview.technicalReview?.length > 0 ? '
üîß Technical Review
    ' + $json.enhancedReport.aiReview.technicalReview.map(review => '
  • ' + review + '
    • ').join('') + '
' : '' }} {{ $json.enhancedReport.aiReview.recommendedEdits?.length > 0 ? '
üìù Recommended Edits
    ' + $json.enhancedReport.aiReview.recommendedEdits.map(edit => '
  • ' + edit + '
    • ').join('') + '
' : '' }}
üìä Quality Metrics

Photo Analysis: {{ $json.enhancedReport.photoAnalysis.total }} total photos ({{ $json.enhancedReport.photoAnalysis.overview }} overview, {{ $json.enhancedReport.photoAnalysis.deficiency }} deficiency) - Score: {{ $json.enhancedReport.photoAnalysis.score }}/30

Deficiency Analysis: {{ $json.enhancedReport.deficiencyAnalysis.complete }}/{{ $json.enhancedReport.deficiencyAnalysis.total }} complete - Score: {{ $json.enhancedReport.deficiencyAnalysis.score }}/40

Completeness: Score {{ $json.enhancedReport.completenessMetrics.score }}/30

{{ $json.enhancedReport.completenessMetrics.missingElements?.length > 0 ? '

Missing Elements:

    ' + $json.enhancedReport.completenessMetrics.missingElements.map(element => '
  • ' + element + '
    • ').join('') + '
' : '' }}
üé¨ Next Steps
{{ $json.needsHumanReview ? '

‚ö†Ô∏è Human Review Required

This report requires manual review and approval before finalization due to quality concerns or recommendations.

' : '

‚úÖ Report meets quality standards and can be approved for client delivery.

' }}
üìù Edit Report ‚úÖ Approve Report üì• Download PDF
This review was generated by RoofMind's AI Quality Assurance System
Report ID: {{ $json.enhancedReport.inspectionId }} | Generated: {{ new Date().toLocaleString() }}
Questions? Reply to this email or contact support.

parameters.responseBody:
{
  "success": true,
  "message": "Inspection review completed successfully",
  "inspection_id": "{{ $json.enhancedReport.inspectionId }}",
  "quality_score": {{ $json.enhancedReport.qualityScore }},
  "quality_grade": "{{ $json.enhancedReport.qualityGrade }}",
  "ai_recommendation": "{{ $json.enhancedReport.aiReview.finalRecommendation }}",
  "needs_human_review": {{ $json.needsHumanReview }},
  "report_url": "https://roofmind.app/reports/{{ $json.enhancedReport.inspectionId }}.pdf",
  "timestamp": "{{ new Date().toISOString() }}"
}

{
  "success": false,
  "error": "Invalid inspection data: Missing inspection_id or invalid status",
  "required_fields": ["inspection_id", "status"],
  "valid_statuses": ["completed", "ready_for_review"],
  "timestamp": "{{ new Date().toISOString() }}"
}
